title: Gaandha Kannazhagi Song Lyrics in Tamil | காந்த கண்ணழகி
stanzas:
Gaandha kannazhagi
looku vittu kicku yethum
muthu pallazhagi
sodi sera vaadi

Gaantha kannazhagaa
takkunnu thaan thatti thookkum
muththu pallazhagaa
mutham onnu thaadaa

ponna paathaa manna paakkum
sangathoda leaderu naan
unna paatha pinne atha
resign pannene

kadhal ennum twitterula
aalillaama kaathirunthen
unna follow pannathaala
trending aanene

looku vittu kicku yethum

sodi sera vaadi

vennilavil landu vaangi
machi veedu kattikittu
internet illamale vazhalaamaa

tamil mattum solli thanthu
thinam thinam kadha solla
ketkalaamaa

jillu jillu jigaruthanda
kittavaadi
unna appadiye saapuduven
geththa thaandi

kediyilla killaadithaan
theriyum maama
nee ketkaamale
thanthiduven enna aamaa

pattunuthaan thottathume
gaali aanen
nee konjunathum
nenjukulla joli aanen
